issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.55:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #006bde.
issues.description: <th class="lower-bound">LOWER BOUND</th>

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.55:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #006bde.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > table > thead > tr:nth-child(2) > th:nth-child(2)

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.54:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #c53f3b.
issues.description: <th class="upper-bound">UPPER BOUND</th>

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.54:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #c53f3b.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > table > thead > tr:nth-child(2) > th:nth-child(4)

issues.title: The relationship between td elements and their associated th elements is not defined. As this table has multiple levels of th elements, you must use the headers attribute on td elements.
issues.description: ...

original_issue.message: The relationship between td elements and their associated th elements is not defined. As this table has multiple levels of th elements, you must use the headers attribute on td elements.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > table
